name: solvejs-monorepo
description: Solve common JavaScript and TypeScript problems with lightweight utilities.

scripts.build: npm run build:core && npm run --workspace packages/solvejs build
scripts.build:core: npm run --workspace packages/solvejs-date build && npm run --workspace packages/solvejs-string build && npm run --workspace packages/solvejs-list build && npm run --workspace packages/solvejs-regex build && npm run --workspace packages/solvejs-constants build && npm run --workspace packages/solvejs-numbers build && npm run --workspace packages/solvejs-validators build
scripts.test: npm run test:core && npm run --workspace packages/solvejs test
scripts.test:core: npm run --workspace packages/solvejs-date test && npm run --workspace packages/solvejs-string test && npm run --workspace packages/solvejs-list test && npm run --workspace packages/solvejs-regex test && npm run --workspace packages/solvejs-constants test && npm run --workspace packages/solvejs-numbers test && npm run --workspace packages/solvejs-validators test
